sentences.en: An expert was needed to authenticate the original Van Gogh painting from his imitation.

sentences.en: Documentaries offered the chance to authenticate the accuracy of the various details in these models.
sentences.cn: 纪录片为核实这些模型中各种细节的准确性提供了机会。

sentences.en: He says he'll have no problem authenticating the stamp.

sentences.cn: 它通过在原始数据中嵌入秘密信息──水印(watermarks)来证实该数据的所有权归属.

sentences.en: The leading ISO 9000 authenticate and procured 85 separately above performances.

sentences.en: The method can be used to authenticate between CAs in the different PKI trust domains.

sentences.en: The painting has been authenticated by experts.

sentences.en: There was no way to authenticate the recording, but the voice sounded like al - Zarqawi's.
sentences.cn: 目前还不能断定这盘录音带的真伪, 但是听起来象扎卡维的声音.

sentences.en: This paper discusses how to authenticate user identification, prevent and control invalid access.

sentences.cn: 为了验证他的消息,耶稣显示了各种各样的奇迹和治愈疾病的行为.

sentences.en: To try to authenticate the device again, click Back. To skip the device, click Next.

sentences.en: We would have to authenticate your relationship with the boy.
sentences.cn: 我们必须证实一下您和那个孩子的关系.

trans.tran_en: to prove that something is true or real

trans.tran_cn: 证明是真实的、可靠的或有效的，鉴定，使生效
trans.tran_en: If you authenticate something, you state officially that it is genuine after examining it
